price: ئۇلار: «بىز ئۇنى ئاتىسىدىن سوراپ (سېنىڭ ئالدىڭغا ئېلىپ كېلىشكە) تىرىشىمىز، بىز چوقۇم مۇشۇنداق قىلىمىز» دېدى[61].
arabic: قَالُواْ سَنُرَٰوِدُ عَنۡهُ أَبَاهُ وَإِنَّا لَفَٰعِلُونَ

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qālū sanurāwidu ʿanhu abāhu wa-innā lafāʿilūna
translations: We will try to get permission
